title: Breaking out of Selfish Patterns
itunes:author: Guest: Pastor Craig Groeschel
itunes:summary: A selfish attitude is toxic for your marriage. We all struggle with it, but through Christ's love, we can learn to let it go. John, Erin and Greg will discuss how to get rid of selfishness in your marriage, and how a bad choice doesn't have to end of your relationship. Receive the book From This Day Forward with your gift of any amount!
